title: Periodic Labour Force Survey (PLFS)
description: Collects data on key employment and unemployment indicators for urban and rural areas including LFPR, WPR, UR by usual and current weekly status.

title: National Accounts Statistics (GDP Estimates)
description: Provides provisional, quarterly and annual estimates of Gross Domestic Product and related aggregates across economic sectors (base year 2011-12).

title: Comprehensive Modular Survey (CMS)
description: Integrated survey framework intended to streamline multiple thematic household surveys into coordinated modular waves.

title: SDG Dashboard Data
description: Collation of indicators aligned with the UN Sustainable Development Goals for India, including social, economic and environmental metrics.

title: Consumer Price Index - Food & Beverages
description: Price index tracking changes in the retail prices of food and beverage items forming part of the CPI basket.
